Wellington.Americraft Expo Center: The Expo Center at the South Florida Fairgrounds (also known as the South Florida Fair), formerly the Americraft Expo Center, is a 5,000-seat multi-purpose venue in West Palm Beach, Florida, located at 9067 Southern Boulevard, within a few miles of Royal Palm Beach, Wellington and Loxahatchee. With over 150,000 square feet (14,000 m2), it hosts public and consumer oriented events and shows, as well as special functions, including the South Florida Fair, many craft shows, and meetings. It has also hosted several WWE house shows.
